page_subtitle: Have a question, business inquiry, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you.
section_description: Whether you're interested in collaborating, have a business inquiry, or simply want to share how our stories have touched you, we're here to listen.

faq.question: Can I use your scripts on my channel?
faq.answer: Yes! All purchased scripts include a commercial license for single-channel use on YouTube.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all products. No questions asked.

faq.question: How do I access my purchases?
faq.answer: After purchase, you'll receive an email with download links. Check your spam folder if you don't see it.

faq.question: Do you accept collaboration requests?
faq.answer: We selectively partner with aligned brands and creators. Send us a message with your proposal!
